## USA Energy

USA has a largely deregulated energy market.
Commercial energy rates can vary substantially from state to state.
The US Energy Information Administration (EIA) collects lots of useful data and makes it publicly available.

--- .class #id 

## Energy Information Administration (EIA)

The EIA website (www.eia.gov) is a rich resource for energy information.
It is updated on a regular basis.
It is the go to site for anything energy related.

--- .class #id 

## Commercial Energy Rates

Commercial energy rates vary from state to state.
The EIA collects data on commercial energy rates for every state.
The data on commercial enery rates is updated monthly.
